price: Quienes digan: "¡Nuestro Señor es Dios!, y luego obren correctamente, no tienen de qué sentir temor ni estar tristes [en el Día del Juicio Final]
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna qālū rabbunā al-lahu thumma is'taqāmū falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
